state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, make an effort to go to the east. Then, attempt to go to the east. And then, attempt to travel north. After that, travel north. Then, make an effort to head west. Then, move north. After that, try to go east. And then, attempt to go east. And then, attempt to move south. With that accomplished, venture east. Then, try to travel south. Following that, go south. That done, make an effort to travel east. Okay, and then, travel east. And then, lift the coin from the floor of the basement. And once you've done that, you win! -= Cookhouse =- I just think it's awesome that you're in a cookhouse now. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Cookhouse =-0/1
